issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The TestDropPartitions tests revealed that NPE is thrown if the dropPartition(String db_name, String tbl_name, List<String> part_vals, PartitionDropOptions options) method is called with null options and with a part_vals list which contains null elements.

Example: NPE is thrown in the following test cases
 * testDropPartitionNullPartDropOptions
 * testDropPartitionNullVal

ATTACHMENT ID: 12913404 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

[~stakiar]: I was also surprised to learn that there are client side transformations on the HiveMetaStoreClient from [~kuczoram]. Given that we do not want to change the API with this changes, do you agree to continue with [~kuczoram]'s proposed patch?

Thanks,

Peter

Yeah, I think this patch looks good. +1 from me.

 Agree we don't want to make backwards incompatible changes to the API here, so adding the checks in the HMS Client makes sense.

Pushed to master.

Thanks for the patch [~kuczoram]!
Thanks a lot [~pvary] for committing the patch!
This jira is resolved and released with Hive 3.0 If you find an issue with it, please create a new jira.
